JOIN TstOrgUserRelation r ON r.userId = usr.id
WHERE TRUE
AND ( usr.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%','${keywords}','%' ) OR usr.email LIKE CONCAT('%','${keywords}','%' ) OR usr.phone LIKE CONCAT('%','${keywords}','%' ) )
AND usr.disabled = #{disabled}
AND r.orgId = #{orgId} AND usr.deleted != TRUE ORDER BY usr.id ASC
